entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 March 2023
